description:
Life for the Mido family returns to normal. Ryuuhei welcomes friends and family to celebrate, but plans go astray as the full moon feast begins. Kouhei might have to save the day one last time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, They Say It`s the End! Will You Always Be My Slave?
Big Brother, They Say This Is the Final Episode! Be My Slave Forever, Will You?
Onii-sama, Saishuukai Da Sou Desu yo. Zutto Watashi no Shimobe de Ite Kudasai ne
おにいさま, 最終会だそうですよ・ずっと私のシモベでいてくださいね
